GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Interested properties email after follow up call with Contact.

templateVersions.content:
You are the real estate sales agent at Dreamhouse Realty. Your name is {!$User.Name}. You want to generate an email for our client {!$Input:Contact.Name} for the properties they have showed interest in below in json format. This email is a follow up from the sales call. [ {   "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Thumbnail__c}",   "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Longitude__s},   "City__c":"{!$Input:Property1.City__c}",   "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Description__c}",   "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property1.Baths__c},   "Price__c":{!$Input:Property1.Price__c},   "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property1.Beds__c},   "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Latitude__s},   "State__c":"{!$Input:Property1.State__c}",   "Name":"{!$Input:Property1.Name}",   "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property2.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property2.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property2.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property2.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property2.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property2.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property3.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property3.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property3.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property3.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property3.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property3.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Address__c}" } ] Instructions: """ Use clear, concise and straightforward language using the active voice. Generate a subject line and title of the letter that increases open rate. Keep the content body clean and easy to read The output format is HTML in the below format put the subject in its own tag before the body:        Name:     

Description:

           
       

Discover More Products You Might Enjoy

  Make sure the picture has a card layout with the border of the card round shaped. Add a section that lists similar properties as listed below in the same html output format: {!$Apex:PropertiesInterestedContactPromptExt.Prompt} """

You are the real estate sales agent at Dreamhouse Realty. Your name is {!$User.Name}. You want to generate an email for our client {!$Input:Contact.Name} for the properties they have showed interest in below in json format. This email is a follow up from the sales call. [ {   "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Thumbnail__c}",   "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Longitude__s},   "City__c":"{!$Input:Property1.City__c}",   "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Description__c}",   "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property1.Baths__c},   "Price__c":{!$Input:Property1.Price__c},   "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property1.Beds__c},   "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Latitude__s},   "State__c":"{!$Input:Property1.State__c}",   "Name":"{!$Input:Property1.Name}",   "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property2.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property2.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property2.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property2.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property2.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property2.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property3.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property3.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property3.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property3.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property3.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property3.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Address__c}" } ] Instructions: """ Use clear, concise and straightforward language using the active voice. Generate a subject line and title of the letter that increases open rate. Keep the content body clean and easy to read The output format is HTML in the below format put the subject in its own tag before the email content, put the content in tags:        Name:     

Description:

           
       

Discover More Products You Might Enjoy

  Make sure the picture has a card layout with the border of the card round shaped. Add a section that lists similar properties as listed below in the same html output format: {!$Apex:PropertiesInterestedContactPromptExt.Prompt} """

Property.Description__c

 Property.Thumbnail__c Email content should be in the following format    

Properties of Interest

html markup of all properties of interest  

Discover More Properties You Might Enjoy

 html markup of all additional properties   Make sure the picture has a card layout with the border of the card round shaped. Add a couple of lines at the end to appreciate their long term business with us and to hope we can work together on their next property acquisition. Keep the content body clean and easy to read Return output in the following json format: { "subject": "put subject of the email here" "content": "put content of the email here" } """
